Intuit QuickBooks
Demo scheduled on XX-April-2017.
Dear {!Opportunity.Primary_Contact__c}, Thank you for your time on the call. As discussed, I am scheduling a personal QuickBooks product demo exclusively for you. We hope that you found the session useful and that it provided you with a good overview of the product. You can also invite your CA or other members of staff who will be using QuickBooks to attend this session.
Here’s what we will be covering during the demo:
How to setup your company in QuickBooks
How to setup taxes
How to create an invoice
If you get stuck with QuickBooks, reply to this email or give us a call at {!User.MobilePhone}. We are here to help.
Ready to purchase QuickBooks? Just sign into your account and convert your free trial into a paid subscription.
Have an awesome day! {!User.Name} Quickbooks Consultant {!User.Email} {!User.MobilePhone}
